notes: Initial analysis of Core Web Vitals.

Home.notes: LCP optimized with priority image and optional font. Layout shift minimized.

Location.notes: Text-heavy, fast LCP. Map embed is lazy loaded on interaction.

Condition.notes: Static content. Video section eager loading was identified, but lazy loading rejected due to SEO risk.

fix.description: Optimized TrustStrip background by replacing backdrop-blur-lg with high-opacity solid background.
fix.impact: Reduces paint cost and composite layer overhead on every page, improving INP and scrolling performance (frame rate) on low-end devices.
